posts.name: scott-signal
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.40.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • We fixed a rare bug that prevented some chats from opening correctly after they were selected, so now Signal Desktop doesn’t also draw a blank while you’re trying to remember what they said.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.39.0-beta.1…v7.40.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

Thanks for being a beta tester!

New Version: 7.40.0-beta.1

44 new commits since 7.39.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.40.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Bump electron from 33.2.1 to 33.3.1 [2]

  • Update sendStateByConversationId for lonely groups [3]

  • Fix backup import for unused admin call links [4]

  • Fix import of link previews without date [5]

  • Use minimal replacement class for MessageModel [6]

  • Add React Devtools [7]

  • Introduce ability to play mp4 files as they download [8]

  • MessageRequests: Only add events to timeline if value really changed [9]

  • Migrate to private class properties/methods [10]

  • Update ClearingData screen UI [11]

  • QR code rotation [12]

  • Remove desktop.calling.adhoc flags [13]

  • Show info for permanently undownloadable visual attachments [14]

  • Improve performance of deleting all data [15]

  • Disable fsync during backup import [16]

  • Update remote configs for ringrtcAdm feature. [17]

  • Use specific string for ClearingData [18]

  • Rename deleted strings [19]

  • Release notes for 7.39 [20]

  • Update strings [21]

  • Update DNS fallback [22]

  • Unmark string as deleted [23]

  • libsignal-net: propagate close code from manual close [24]

  • Use Ubuntu 22 in CI [25]

  • Fix undownloadable attachment check to require download error [26]

  • Use X-Signal-Timestamp header [27]

  • Shorten description string [28]

  • Check validity of link previews on import [29]

  • Ensure adhoc builds expire correctly [30]

  • Change QR code style on linking screen [31]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.49.3 [32]

  • Show info for permanently undownloadable file and audio attachments [33]

  • Optimize svg using new version of svgo [34]

  • Fix provisioner early termination [35]

  • Backups: support direct story replies [36]

  • Fix progress bar width in import screen [37]

  • Fix attribution of chat updates on import [38]

  • Enable link & sync in beta [39]

  • parseContact: Be resilient to invalid phone numbers [40]

  • Use @electron/symbolicate-mac [41]

  • Add release notes for 7.40 [42]

  • Update strings [43]

  • 7.40.0-beta.1 [44]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.39.0-beta.1…v7.40.0-beta.1

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

For technical reasons, not all languages may be listed below. However, everything from “Updated language translations” and similar commits is listed, so the list is likely complete. You can view the full comparison to 7.39.0-beta.1 so far here.

Link to the previous desktop beta: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.39 release - #12 by Whatnoww
And this new thread is missing the Desktop Beta Feedback tag
Edit: I see it has been added, thanks @indutny-signal
